mapper.insert: insert into db_functionconfig (SID, 'NAME', OPER, SPBASECODE, OPENFLAG, OPERTIME, CREATOPER, 'STATUS', FUNCTIONID, CREATTIME, DESCR) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spbasecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{functionid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_functionconfig set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPBASECODE = #{spbasecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOPER = #{creatoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FUNCTIONID = #{functionid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATTIME = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SID, 'NAME', OPER, SPBASECODE, OPENFLAG, OPERTIME, CREATOPER, 'STATUS', FUNCTIONID, CREATTIME, DESCR from db_functionconfig where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SID, 'NAME', OPER, SPBASECODE, OPENFLAG, OPERTIME, CREATOPER, 'STATUS', FUNCTIONID, CREATTIME, DESCR from db_functionconfig
